Milano Marathon was ran on 7/4 and we want to share the message we received form Soleterre, the Onlus we decided to support in this event.  ”We want to thank you from the bottom of our hearts for running the XXII edition of the Milan Marathon with us.  No, you didn't just run with us, you ran for all the children with cancer and their families that we meet every day: you ran to give them a home, to keep them together and to support them with psychological support during all stages of the disease.  For us it was a very strong emotion to see you united and smiling in reaching the same beautiful goal.  €11,074 so far are the funds that you have managed to raise all together for children and their families on Rete del dono. An absolute record for Soleterre at the Milan Marathon!” We as CRS @ ALFA LAVAL join Soleterre and THANK YOU ALL for your support.

Today we published the 2023 Alfa Laval Annual & Sustainability report. A moment to be proud of what the sustainability team and colleagues across Alfa Laval have accomplished🌍💫💙A report that shows that with a clear focus, engagement and together with our partners we create movement. A few of the highlights:To walk the talk: 🎯SBTi validated targets💚97% of the electricity from renewables, 60% of our sites use energy from renewables⚡️16% improvement of energy efficiency at our sites (target 5% yearly)💧17% reduction of water withdrawals at sites in water scarce areas (target 5% yearly)💥Climate Playbook focuses our efforts across the Group🤝Strong partnerships are a must to make positive impact together, eg to reduce Scope 3 upstreams. Last year Alfa Laval teamed up with Boliden to use their Low-Carbon copper and with Outokumpu to use their Circle Green Stainless Steel to make heat exchangers that increases our customers' energy efficiency.Proud to work at a company that takes responsibility💙hashtag#Sustainability hashtag#AlfaLaval hashtag#PioneeringPositiveImpact

2023 Annual & Sustainability Report is released! For the most part, 2023 became a year of operational stability. After several years of exceptional volatility due to the pandemic and geopolitical turmoil, global supply chains normalized, and customer service and delivery lead times improved throughout the year. Alfa Laval’s climate commitment has been strengthened significantly during 2023, with a science-based validation of our climate targets, collaboration with external partners both up- and downstream in our value chain, and introducing new and more energy-efficient products on the market. To read the full report and learn more about how Alfa Laval is enabling change➡️ https://lnkd.in/dwe69DuJhashtag#AlfaLaval hashtag#AnnualReport hashtag#SustainabilityReport
